tiles.title: My Operator
tiles.content: View or update information of your operator here.

tiles.title: Operations
tiles.content: View the operations owned by your operator, or to add and register new operation to your operator here.

tiles.title: Contacts
tiles.content: View the contacts of your operator, or to add new contact for your operator here.

tiles.title: Users and Access Requests
tiles.content: View, approve or decline Business BCeID user access requests to your operator, or to assign access type to users here.

tiles.title: Register an Operation
tiles.content: Track the registration of operations, or to start new registration here.

tiles.title: Report an Event
tiles.content: Report start up, closing, or temporary shutdown, acquisition, divestment, transer, etc. here.
